name: TRON Mau5
description:
ALL heads available in ANY color, in either VELVET or DISCO material.
Made CUSTOM to your order

Perfect for raves, concerts, parties, etc...


SPECS: 

Light up eyes (any color) (With or without X's)
Lightweight and easy to wear 
Adjustable helmet inside for comfortable and secure fit
See-through mesh mouth 
Strong detachable styrofoam ears
Durable construction



Shipping & Handling: 

ALL PRODUCTS INCLUDE TRACKING NUMBER AND INSURANCE 
Allow one week for build time

United States - $25 USPS Parcel Post 2-7 Business Days
Canada- $40 UPS Ground
All other countries- $65 3-5 Business Days USPS Express Mail



*All sales are final. We are not responsible for items damaged during shipping. 

**We can keep you updated on the progress of your head with pictures through text or e-mail by request!
